title: Say You Say Me
lyrics: Say you say me, Say it for al- ways That's the way it should be Say you say me, Say it to-ge- ther na-tura- lly! I had a dream I had an awesome dream People in the park Playing games in the dark And what they played was a masquerade From behind the walls of doubt A voice crying out! Say you say me, Say it for al- ways That's the way it should be Say you say me, Say it to-ge- ther na-tura- lly!
